name: Literatur-Review
description: Scientific literature: papers, methods, consensus, contradictions.
strategy: 1) Semantic Scholar and PubMed for peer-reviewed sources. 2) Prefer recent and highly cited. 3) Extract methods and conclusions. 4) Note when studies disagree. 5) Identify open questions.
synthesis_instructions: Structure by: consensus findings, contested points, methodology notes, and gaps in the literature. Cite by title and year.
